name: A MAZE - Museum Of Touch
description:
A MAZE - 2021 Museum Jam submission

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move, use your mouse click & drag to make objects appear!

Credits: 

This game idea was developed for the A MAZE. Museum Online Game Jam 'A World in Motion' organized by the Leibniz Research Museums and the A MAZE. / Berlin 2021 - 10th International Games and Playful Media Festival.

I worked with:

Deutsches Bergbau-Museum Bochum – Leibniz Research Museum for Geo-resources 

Deutsches Museum, Munich

Germanisches Nationalmuseum – Leibniz Research Museum of Cultural History, Nuremberg

Objects used:

Deutsches Museum: Exzenterpresse ( https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/exzenterpresse-00358f9619334b0ca2daab04cda6c31d )
Deutsches Museum: Glockenguss ( https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/glockenguss-e2329d51abec4800b6d602b9031d6d62 )
Germanisches Nationalmuseum: Hobel (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hobel-1808-z2312-16c393c0591a46eb9a42ca29c0f7ea6...)
Germanisches Nationalmuseum: Maskenfibel (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/maskenfibel-latenezeit-vb1817-f0fc6dc0005043e1a0...)
Deutsches Bergbau-Museum Bochum:  Siegelzange (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/siegelzange-fdf215c5beb14110ae06616c4bceb8bb)
Deutsches Bergbau-Museum Bochum: (private collection)
